title: Chemical Product Design
description: Chemical engineering principles applied to the design of products.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHEM 2312 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 2313 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or CHBE 3120 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
